Description:
"Everything You've Ever Wanted & More"
If location, size & quality are important to you then look no further than this family home. Consisting of 3 BR, ens & WIR to the main br & BIRs to remaining BRs, a large OP lounge/living area with gas wall heating, updated kitchen with ceramic cook tops, s/steel apps & plenty of storage space + a spacious laundry. Outdoor covered pergola + large Colorbond garage with 3 roller doors. 2 car carport with extra room for all-year-round ent. & DB gates that give you rear access to the property for cars/boats/caravans. Located in a quiet court on a large 546m2 block (approx.) with a potential rent return of $320/week.
Insights: 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Great family home on 696m2!
Located only minutes from public transport, the Corio Village Shopping Centre and with fast and easy access to Melbourne this brick home with huge backyard offers everything a family needs in a private court location.
Open plan kitchen/dining/living is perfect for the modern Australian family. All 3 bedrooms come with built in robes and are serviced by a central bathroom with separate toilet.
Enjoy a huge deck and pergola out the back that gets bathed in the morning sun, and also a decked verandah out the front that enjoys the afternoon sun. Got a bit hot sunning yourself? Split systems in the living and the master bedroom will cool you down!
An oversized secure double garage is positioned towards the rear of the property, with room in the driveway for another half-a-dozen cars, boats, caravans, whatever!
For those looking for an investment opportunity the potential rental return is approximately $320 per week. The current tenant has been there for over 6yrs and is happy to vacate should an owner-occupier purchase. A testament to what a great family home this is.
Call now to arrange an inspection.
Insights: 22 Stapledon Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Close To Everything For Next To Nothing
Situated in the residential growth zone (RGZ2) this property is the perfect investment, first home or your next lucrative development project. Immaculately presented this home offers open plan lounge room, with kitchen/dining, 3 bedrooms and a large bathroom. The property can be rented immediately or offers scope for further enhancement to increase your rental return. Outside there's a large garden with a single lock up garage and a carport. Within minutes to Corio Village Shopping Centre, primary and secondary schools, medical centres and public transport, everything is at your fingertips. This is your chance to buy into the market at an affordable price but you will need to be quick.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Immaculate Home // Residential Growth Zone
Perfectly presented with generous accommodation. Positioned only meters from the Corio Shopping Village and offering quick access to the Melbourne Road, medical facilities, public transport & local schools.
This home presents itself as a great opportunity to enter the market or expand your investment portfolio. Standing proudly on 624m2 (approx.) and zoned RGZ2 (Residential Growth Zone - schedule 2) Opening the door to future development possibilities (STCA).
Features include:
- Large open plan family living and meals overlooked by the functional kitchen
- Three bedrooms all with built in robes
- Large bathroom, spa bath and shower.
- Second separate shower and toilet
- Oversized DLUG with rear access and workshops space.
- Central heating
- Split system A/C
- Ceiling Fans
- Rinnai water temperature control
- Spacious backyard, perfect for your kids.
- Large undercover alfresco with cafe blinds that will allow you to entertain all year round.
This generous, neat and tidy home is well positioned for a convenient lifestyle and solid future growth. This is a must see property.
Terms...10% Deposit, 60/90 day Settlement... For alternative arrangements, please discuss with agent.

Description:
An ideal place to start.
Whether you're just starting out and searching for a first home or looking to invest this well presented two bedroom, brick veneer home on a 617m2 (approx.) allotment is sure to excite all buyers alike! Boasting a versatile floor plan the home offers a spacious lounge upon entry featuring large windows which allows natural light to stream through the home. Located at the centre of the property lies the neat kitchen that provides ample bench space for cooking and plenty of storage. The 2 bedrooms in total contain BIR's with the master suite offering an abundance of space situated towards the rear of the home. Outdoors presents a fantastic area for those who enjoy entertaining which includes an undercover decked alfresco which leads down to the well-presented and easy to maintain backyard. The large and functional shed is sure to impress all and offers ample possibilities for the new owners. Comprising of a large workspace that continues onto the spacious rumpus room including a gas heater for the cooler seasons and additional shedding to the side. Easy access to the Ring Road brings Melbourne under an hour away & Geelong CBD only 15 minutes, along with the Corio shopping centre in walking distance, bus stops close by, local school and sporting grounds. Don't miss the opportunity to inspect this property!

Description:
Great Value In Sought After Location
Located only minutes from public transport, the Corio Village Shopping Centre and with fast and easy access to Melbourne this solid brick home offers everything a family needs in a sought after pocket. Comprising an open plan living and kitchen area, formal dining room and additional living area at the front of the house with a gas wall heater and wall air conditioner. The kitchen offers a built in pantry, stainless steel electric oven and gas 4 burner cook top. Offering 3 bedrooms with built in robes, the main with a ceiling fan and direct access to the two way bathroom that offers a shower, bath, vanity and toilet. Outside offers an undercover entertaining area, enclosed triple carport with roller door, garden shed, outdoor toilet and grassed yard. For those looking for an investment opportunity the potential rental return is approximately $300 - $310 per week.
Terms: 10% Deposit, 30 day Settlement. For alternative arrangements, please discuss with agent.

Description:
Quality & Presentation At Its Absolute Finest
Located within minutes from the North Shore train station for Melbourne and Geelong commuters, take a look inside this magnificent home situated on a large 650m2 block (approx). With a beautiful uninterrupted view over the gorgeous manicured yard and Stead Park, enjoy the quality that has been put into this marvellous home by its loving owners over time. From the front door to the rear of the home enjoy polished floorboards throughout, a stunning bathroom & kitchen plus 2 separate living areas for the family to enjoy. Solar panels & quality fixtures and fittings that will impress, a large double garage and a gorgeous fence for privacy are just some of the extras you will find in this home. A much-loved home that you will not want to miss, call Maddison or Jordan for an inspection.

Description:
Gorgeous four bedroom home.
Nestled in the heart of Cloverdale Estate in a quiet court location lies this charming 4 bedroom brick veneer home with ample living spaces for the whole family to enjoy. Whether you're searching for a neat investment opportunity or family home this property is sure to tick a lot of boxes. This home offers two bathrooms one to the front of the home and one to the back which offers ample space for family members visiting or living within. Two of the four bedrooms include BIR and generous sized carpeted rooms along with ceiling fans. The kitchen provides gas cooking with the dining room opening up to the undercover alfresco area great for entertaining. Sitting on 622m2 (approx.) allotment, this is an ideal opportunity to purchase a tidy property with public transport available just around the corner, easy access to Corio Shopping Centre and further major amenities such as schools, Ring Road and multiple reserves. Homes with this much potential do not last long, please enquire to ensure you don't miss out.

Boasting a grand and very inviting entrance you will be lead through to the large living area with wall-to-wall carpet and new quality double-blinds. Description:
Perfect Family Home with Room Inside & Out!
This beautifully maintained and spacious 4 bedroom home with 9ft ceilings will appeal to all buyers. Perfectly situated property on a generous allotment of 732m2 (approx) and positioned amongst other well kept homes in a quiet court. All necessary amenities are at your doorstep which include schools, public transport, shopping centres & easy access to the Ring Road bringing Melbourne under an hour away & Geelong CBD 15 minutes. Be very quick as this property wont last long.
-4 Bedrooms all with BIRs
-2 Living areas
-Large dining room/3rd living
-Spacious kitchen with gas cooking, oven with separate griller
-Main bathroom with separate toilet, plus 2nd toilet
-Gas central heating, a/c plus ceiling fans
-Single garage with drive through access to another single garage
-Manicured gardens front & back with undercover pergola
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Corner Block!
This cute home offers many opportunities to the astute purchaser, from being a neat and tidy home to move straight into, lease out or potentially sub-divide (STCA). Featuring a wide street frontage, garaging for four cars and a neatly updated, modern home.
The home has a neat and tidy open plan kitchen and dining with access to the rear yard, a spacious sunlit lounge room, three substantial bedrooms, (or two plus a large study) all with built in robes, central family bathroom, separate laundry and an undercover entertaining area. Outside has a large lawn yard, established trees and landscaping, double lock up garage and side driveway with carport.
Close to all amenities, schools, public transport and Corio Village, this home really will suit many buyers. Be quick to inspect!

Description:
Solid first home or investment.
This delightful brick veneer home offers purchasers a chance to secure an updated and well cared for 3 bedroom home (all with BIR) on a generous 593m2 approx. parcel of land in a great location, within walking distance to the Corio shopping centre and just a 10 minute drive to the Geelong CBD. This house offers two living areas, with one on arrival and one at the rear. Centrally located you'll find the laundry and bathroom with separate shower and bath. The dining room includes a bar for entertainment and kitchen provides ample bench space and gas appliances. The rear yard itself offers an abundance of space still for pets or children to enjoy.
Don't miss the opportunity to inspect this property!

Description:
Family Appeal!
A prime opportunity now exists to acquire this wonderful family home! Neatly presented, it comprises 3 carpeted bedrooms with built-in-robes, bathroom with separate shower and bath and 2 living zones. A large oak kitchen appointed with wraparound bench, dishwasher, 90cm gas stove and breakfast bar flows through to a fantastic undercover entertainment area with adjoining games room. With downlights, new carpets, ceiling fans, split system inverter and inbuilt gas heater, every modern comfort is included! A secure lock-up double garage and tidy garden complete this residence. Representing outstanding value, inspection a must!
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
